title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
description: Senior ML Engineer position focused on predictive modeling and time series forecasting. Work with Python, PyTorch, scikit-learn on production ML systems. Build ETL pipelines, feature engineering, hyperparameter tuning (GridSearchCV). Deploy models using MLflow, Docker, AWS SageMaker. Time series: Prophet, ARIMA, anomaly detection. Metrics: RMSE, MAE, F1, AUC. Tools: Jupyter, pandas, NumPy, Git, SQL. Collaborate in Agile teams, 5+ years experience.
requirements: Python, PyTorch, scikit-learn, time series forecasting, MLflow, Docker, AWS SageMaker, SQL, Git

title: Data Scientist
description: Data Scientist for business intelligence and statistical analysis. Python, SQL, Tableau for reporting and dashboards. Statistical modeling, regression, clustering. ETL processes, data cleaning, EDA. No deep learning required - focus on business metrics. Tools: pandas, Matplotlib, Excel.
requirements: Python, SQL, Tableau, statistics, regression, clustering, pandas, Excel

title: Python Backend Developer
description: Backend developer for web applications. Django, Flask, REST APIs, PostgreSQL. Docker, Git, CI/CD pipelines. No ML/AI - pure backend engineering. Microservices architecture.
requirements: Python, Django, Flask, REST API, PostgreSQL, Docker, Git

title: AI Research Engineer
description: Research ML Engineer position. PyTorch, TensorFlow, transformers, NLP. Deep learning research, publishing papers. PhD or MSc required. Cutting-edge AI, not production systems. Experimentation focus.
requirements: PyTorch, TensorFlow, transformers, NLP, research, PhD/MSc

title: Junior Python Developer
description: Entry-level Python position. Learn basics: Python syntax, Git, simple scripts. No ML, no advanced topics. Training provided.
requirements: Python basics, willingness to learn, Git

title: MLOps Engineer
description: MLOps Engineer to deploy and maintain ML systems in production. Kubernetes, Docker, AWS/Azure, CI/CD for ML. MLflow, model monitoring, A/B testing. Python, Airflow, Terraform. DevOps background preferred.
requirements: Python, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, MLflow, CI/CD, Airflow, DevOps

title: Computer Vision Engineer
description: CV Engineer for object detection and image segmentation projects. PyTorch, YOLO, Detectron2, OpenCV. Real-time inference, edge deployment. Experience with CNNs, transfer learning.
requirements: PyTorch, Computer Vision, YOLO, OpenCV, CNNs, object detection

title: NLP Engineer
description: NLP Engineer for chatbots and text analysis. Transformers, BERT, GPT, spaCy, Hugging Face. Polish language processing. LLM fine-tuning, RAG systems.
requirements: Python, NLP, transformers, BERT, Hugging Face, LLMs, spaCy

title: Business Intelligence Analyst
description: BI Analyst creating dashboards and reports. Power BI, Tableau, SQL. No programming required. Excel expert. Stakeholder communication.
requirements: SQL, Power BI, Tableau, Excel, business analysis

title: Full Stack Data Scientist
description: Data Scientist with full-stack skills. Build ML models AND deploy them as web apps. Python, scikit-learn, FastAPI, React basics. Startup environment, wear many hats.
requirements: Python, scikit-learn, ML, FastAPI, React, full-stack, startup
